评论详情: These scrubs fit great - true to size - and a little more fitted than baggy. They are perfectly comfortable for all day wear and feel more like athleisure wear than typical scrubs due to the fit. I love the color and style and am super happy with them. Great quality!

I originally purchased medium size of the same scrub. The fabric was wonderful the pockets had zippers the shirt top had to pockets at the waist and one on the chest. The medium was too large so I returned them and purchased the same scrub in small. Unfortunately, these are not the same!!! The fabric is thinner not the same quality there is no princess seam on the front and no waistline pockets on the scrub top the fabric is not stretchy I'm very disappointed!!!
I have 3 pairs . And want to get more .. scrub top is a little off sizing .. but I use a crew neck tshirt instead . The scrub joggers are super comfy ..
I bought these for my granddaughter she loves them

I’ve had these scrubs lens’s then 2 weeks, they’ve been washed 2x and the stitching is coming apart and the material is worn like like I’ve own and worn them for years!!  Save you money!!!  Buy a name brand set of scrubs!  If I could give no stars I would!!!
Soooo the fabric of these are fabulous! I would compar them to my figs but they are not high waisted at all if you are a bigger girly! Also I’m 5’8 they came up on my calves not comfy.
Pants ran a little small and were definitely petite in length. Color was very vibrant and lovely! Snug fit, needed next bigger size. Overall durable fabric!!!

评论概述: Irregular size, some scrubs are cut bigger than others!!
评论详情: I have experienced a few times that the sizes are not cut exactly the same. Some are bigger than some, for example I am 2XL. Some fits really well and then some fits as if it's a 3XL, it's frustrating not getting my exact size that fits.
I would say these are perfect except you need to order a size up from your normal size. They are seamed well and breath. If you wash them once they will shrink a little as well.

评论概述: Top small and bottoms too large

I am excited to wear these i love joggers and how they look this is my first pair and they are so comfortable.  I ordered a medium but i honestly could have sized down to a small. Super pretty color looks great on my skin tone.  I am 4’11 138lbs for reference.  Super stretchy
It's definitely feeling like figs without the price tags. Love these scrubs but definitely size up! I usually wear a XL and got a 2x.
They're comfortable and soft. Will get another one of a different color. I suggest you size up to one size.

These have a nice cool silky material perfect for summer..you obviously can put underclothes on for winter if you want but these are really nice. They move well on your body and seem to be well made so far. For the price definitely worth it..I bought two pairs and came back to buy two morem

It’s extremely comfortable. Great material and fits so well. Great value for the money. Highly recommend. I’d say if you wear a medium normally in bottoms to size up especially in case it shrinks. Just buy it :)
Good quality fabric

评论概述: Perfect Fit, Even for Tall People
评论详情: This scrub set has been a fantastic find for me as a taller individual. It's always a challenge to find scrubs that fit well, but these jogger-style scrubs meet the mark, extending comfortably to my ankles.  The material is durable and maintains its quality even after several washes. Priced at $30 per set, these scrubs offer excellent value for money. Whether for professional use or comfort, I highly recommend these scrubs for anyone looking for a reliable, well-fitting option.
I'd definitely buy again. I just wish the shirt had pockets at the bottom. I love the jogger design and they're pretty comfy.
Very comfy and soft
Great price for the set! Loves the material and such a great fit. Received so many compliments for the beautiful color. Definitely recommend
They fit perfect GOOD quality close to the fig quality but half the price

She absolutely loves the tapered leg where it cuffs at the ankle because she said it's far more comfortable than her straight leg ones. She would love to order these again.
Wash well, wear well, fit great.
True to size Trude color, all the information is accurate. I bought this as a gift for my friend that’s a nurse and she wears them every day and loves them.

These scrubs are really comfortable! My only complaint is the top is a little snug, but still have room to move around. I will definitely buy another pair. I bought a size medium and that is what I normally wear in other scrub brands.
I’m 5”3 115lbs ordered XS they fit perfectly! Definitely will order again! If your taller then 5’4 you may feel they are short but they are great for being petite!

The scrubs were great, but I found they ran a little bit small. I love the color and the overall quality of the scrubs, but I ordered my normal size and it seem to be a bit snug

Measurements: • Tops 6-8 • Bottoms 9 (26-28) • Height 5’7.5”  Pictured: • PuriPure Scrubs in Galaxy Blue (M) • New Balance 574 V2 in White/Grey • Nike Everyday Plus Cushion Ankle Socks  Main Points: • Lightweight • Slightly stretchy (you can bend) • Breathable • Easy to move in • Short  These are my first pair of scrubs. I’m a size M in everything. They’re pretty short on bottom for me. They start riding up from the ankles but I wear ankle socks to make up for it. I don’t consider myself tall, but if you’re an inch or two shorter, then these would be perfect for you.  There’s a few loose strings on the pants and top but that’s okay. There’s also a hole in the left pocket that I didn’t notice until I was at work. In the photos, the pants are flipped inside out to show the hole.  TL;DR A good pair of scrubs. They’re easy to move in. Just wish they were slightly longer so I can consider buying again.

I typically wear xs small scrubs but this pair was not stretchy at all and fit a bit more snug than my other xs scrubs. I would size up. The quality and overall value is great! The style was cute, jogger style bottoms and a straight fit top perfect to tuck into your bottoms.
these are great.  very comfy scrubs and perfect for 12 hour days.  The only thing I did not like was the pants are a bit short on me.
Not very comfortable, very stiff like fee and pats are short in length (im 5 foot nothings ever too short)
Material feels good, nice quality, and is breathable. They are true to size. This is a large. Love the colors available. Want to get one in every color ☺️
I have been using these scrubs for work. They are very comfortable and light weight. Perfect since I have to use a lead vest for work.

I ordered a large, I really like the quality of the scrubs, all the stitching was perfect. The material is soft and has a slight stretch to it making it easy to move around in. I really liked the cuffed ankle, it’s a fashionable look compared to your standard straight/wide leg scrubs. A great price, for a nice quality set. Overall extremely comfortable. The only issue I had was they were on the shorter side for me, if they had a long option, I would order these again.  I have a bigger chest (36DD) and had no issues with the top fitting.

评论概述: Nice pair of scrubs in a unique color

Very good quality, the fit is true to size, very valuable for the money because scrubs are expensive for good quality scrubs
top runs small pant are short

Pros: -Amazon delivered next day! - Stretchy material that allows movement - color perfectly matched picture (I ordered wine red)  Cons: -No matter how tight I tie the drawstring, the pants still slip down. -Ankle cuff is a little snug, but not bad enough that I wouldn’t recommend. -This will definitely not fit women with larger chest sizes.
Really soft, color is vibrant and red. Received many compliments and it has held up in the washer on the delicate setting.
i ordered my regular size M and this are just unflattering and big. they just dont look right. plus the material is just not the best quality. color is faded. and just not for me.

评论概述: Great material, not true to size

Love these scrubs so comfy. Honestly one of the better scrubs I’ve purchase. I like the fit and the quality is really great. I did order a L which does fit loose but I’m inbetween sizes right now so a M is a little snug. But overall really great scrubs love the way they look and fit me

I absolutely love these scrubs. They are so comfortable and they last a long time. I got these in a pink color in a size medium and they looked amazing and so good on me. Scrubs fit true to size and extremely comfy and versatile!

评论概述: I won't be able to wear, the cuff area is too tight
评论详情: I ordered a large (normal size) and the top fit just fine. I knew they would be short because of the inseam length shown on the size chart. But they are too tight where the cuff meets the leg fabric. The waist area was fine. The material is nice, but a little heavier than others I wear. I guess nicer for colder months. They do not have a lot of stretch to them with 5% spandex.

I was a bit disappointed in the making of this set. I ordered a 2x set and the sizing was way off, The pants were not only short they fit snug. I am a size xl but these 2xs felt like a xl. I love the variety of pockets on the pants though. The shirt it fit snug for a 2x and was disappointed the shirt had only 1 pocket which was on the chest area , which did not help holding things I needed  for doing my job.  I loved the wonderful color of this set and think for a scrub set price is okay, but choosing a size think bigger .
I live the material of the scrub, the only thing is the pants is a little to big for me but the top for perfect. Easy to wash it doesn’t fid out once you wash it.
I am shadowing at a local veterinary clinic. I bought these to be able to have the right wear and I was not disappointed! I look forward to using them in action.

评论概述: A Thoughtful Gesture for My Amazing Wife!
评论详情: I recently decided to surprise my wife with these Scrubs, and it turned out to be an excellent choice.  When my wife tried on the Classic V-neck Scrub Top and Jogger Scrub Pants, I could see how much she loved them. These scrubs are so cute and comfy I really love that the pants are like joggers with the ankle cuff. Perfect for any job in the medical field that requires scrubs!! Super cute!

I love the navy color of the set I received. The scrubs fit as expected. The material is comfortable and not too heavy. I don’t usually get pants with cuffs on the bottom, but these don’t bother me. They aren’t too tight. Overall I’m very happy with the set.
Quality material. Well placed pockets. Unable to comment on size as wrong size was delivered.

These are really comfortable scrubs. Jogger ankle and it is nice and soft. Size fit as expected and it is great thickness. Breathable and the color is nice and dark navy. They have washed up well and maintained size and shape. Pretty pleased with these!

评论概述: Good But Pants Sizing Is Off
评论详情: Overall, this PuriPure Scrubs Set for Women is of decent quality. I am typically a size medium, but i decided to order up to a large for a looser fit. The scrub top fit perfectly. However, the pants sizing was a little off. The waist was huge, the length way too short and super tight around the ankle area. It won't stop me from wearing them however. They are still very comfortable and fashionable. They would almost be perfect if the joggers weren't so off in the sizing.
Love it, very comfy and good quality would recommend and would definitely get another color !
